title: Andersen: Retaliating against Killorn for Leafs net crash would have been bad move - TSN

content: TSN Toronto reporter Mark Masters checks in daily with news and notes on the Maple Leafs The Leafs practised at Ford Performance Centre on Wednesday ahead of Thursdays game against the Nashville Predators Midway through the third period on Tuesday night T chars
